item.title: Knowledge Management for Developers
item.description: As I understand it, Tiago Forte is the person credited with the term ‘second brain’, in reference to his solutions to the problem of personal knowledge management. I say ‘solutions’ because he goes on to recommend using a stack of software applications for essentially one thing - email, to do list, task managers and some notebook application. In a similar vein, the ‘second brain’ concept had spawned a number of related ‘solutions’, such as Zettelkasten, PARA, Roam Research, Notion.
